text.content: To run Angular application, just execute

rich_text.plain_text: To run Angular application, just execute

text.content:
ts_devserver(
    name = "devserver",
    port = 4200,
    additional_root_paths = [
        "npm/node_modules/zone.js/dist",
        "npm/node_modules/tslib",
    ],
    entry_module = "bzl_app/src/main.dev",
    serving_path = "/bundle.min.js",
    static_files = [
        "@npm//node_modules/zone.js:dist/zone.min.js",
        "@npm//node_modules/tslib:tslib.js",
        "index.html",
    ],
    deps = [":src"],
)

        "@npm//node_modules/tslib:tslib.js",
        "index.html",
    ],
    deps = [":src"],
)
